Wisdom: إِيَّاكُمْ وَالْغُلُوَّ فِينَا قُولُوا إِنَّا مَرْبُوبُونَ وَاعْتَقِدُوا فِي فَضْلِنَا مَا شِئْتُمْ
enWisdom: Be cautious of exceeding the limits with regards to us; say that we are servants of our Lord, and then you may believe anything you wish about our merits

Wisdom: هَلَكَ فِيَّ رَجُلَانِ مُحِبٌّ غَالٍ وَمُبْغِضٌ قَالٍ
enWisdom: Two types of people are destroyed because of me: the fanatic lover and the extreme hater

Wisdom: إِلَيْنَا يَرْجِعُ الْغَالِي وَبِنَا يَلْحَقُ التَّالِي
enWisdom: To us return the ones who exceed the bounds and the ones who lag behind [come forward to] meet up with us
